translation.en: Hey, gods. It's Devi Vishwakumar,
translation.zh: ‎各位神明 我是德维维什瓦库马尔

translation.en: your favorite Hindu girl in the San Fernando Valley.
translation.zh:
‎圣费尔南多谷
‎最受你们喜爱的印度姑娘

translation.en: What's a-poppin'?
It's the first day of school, and I thought we should have a check in.
translation.zh:
‎今天是开学第一天
‎我想我们该联系一下了

translation.en: I think we can all agree that last year sucked
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我们应该都承认由于多种原因

translation.en: for a number of reasons.
So I thought of a few ways you guys can make it up to me.
translation.zh: ‎所以我给你们几位想了些办法补偿我

translation.en: One: I'd like to be invited to a party with alcohol and hard drugs.
translation.zh:
‎第一 我想被邀请参加
‎有酒有毒品的聚会

translation.en: I'm not gonna do them. I'd just like the opportunity to say:
translation.zh:
‎我不会真的喝酒吸毒
‎我只想有机会说

translation.en: "No cocaine for me, thanks. I'm good."
translation.zh: ‎“我不吸可卡因 谢谢 不用了”

translation.en: Two: I'd love for my arm hair to thin out.
translation.zh: ‎第二 我希望我的手毛能少一点

translation.en: I know it's an Indian thing,
but my forearms look like the frigging floor of a barber shop.
translation.zh: ‎但我的小臂看着像理发店的地板一样

translation.en: And lastly, most importantly,
translation.zh: ‎最后一点 也是最重要的一点

translation.en: I'd really, really like a boyfriend,
translation.zh: ‎我真的真的很想要个男朋友

translation.en: but not some nerd from one of AP classes.
translation.zh: ‎但不要我大学预修课上的那种书呆子

translation.en: Like a guy from a sports team.
He can be dumb. I don't care.
I just want him to be a stone-cold hottie, who could rock me all night long.
translation.zh:
‎我只希望他是个冷酷的大帅哥
‎可以让我爽翻一整夜的那种

translation.en: Thanks for considering. I love you guys.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你们考虑我的请求 爱你们

translation.en: [narrator] As she said, this is Devi Vishwakumar.
translation.zh: ‎就像她说的 她是德维维什瓦库马尔

translation.en: She's a 15-year-old Indian-American girl from Sherman Oaks, California,
translation.zh:
‎一个住在加州谢尔曼奧克斯的
‎15岁印度裔美国女孩

translation.en: and it's her first day of sophomore year.
translation.zh: ‎今天是她高二开学的第一天

translation.en: And I am legendary tennis player, John McEnroe.
translation.zh: ‎而我是传奇网球选手约翰麦肯罗

translation.en: -[upbeat music plays] -[in video] Point to Mr. McEnroe.
[McEnroe] Wow, I look great there.
Now, you may be asking yourself:
why is sports icon John McEnroe narrating this tale?
translation.zh:
‎为什么运动明星约翰麦肯罗
‎要来讲这个故事呢？

translation.en: -Dammit! -It'll make sense later, I promise.
translation.zh:
‎-该死！
‎-我保证 待会儿你就明白了

translation.en: Her story starts when her parents, Nalini and Mohan,
translation.zh: ‎她的故事从她的父母 娜里妮和莫汉

translation.en: moved to the United States in September 2001.
Not a super chill time to be a brown person in America.
translation.zh: ‎那时在美国作为棕色人种很不易

translation.en: -[game chatter on TV] -Yes!
[McEnroe] Devi worshipped her father.
And while he and her mother stayed true to their Indian roots...
translation.zh: ‎虽然她的父母一直遵循印度的传统…

translation.en: No, no, no, thank you. We are vegetarians.
translation.zh: ‎不用了 谢谢 我们是素食主义者

translation.en: ...Devi was all-American.
But shortly after this barbecue,
things got complicated for this little family.
At Devi's spring orchestra concert,
translation.zh: ‎在德维的春季交响音乐会上

translation.en: Mohan had a heart attack.
-[Nalini yells] Mohan! -[crowd gasps]
[Nalini] Somebody call 9-1-1!
[stammers] Somebody call an ambulance. An ambulance, please!
-[crowd gasps] -[Nalini] Mohan!
[McEnroe] He died.
-[somber music playing] -Devi was devastated,
but things were about to get even worse.
A week later...
Devi's legs stopped working.
There was no medical reason why, but they were definitely not working.
translation.zh:
‎没有任何医学上的原因
‎但她的腿就是不会动了

translation.en: And now, she was in a wheelchair.
Just because Devi is confined to a wheelchair,
does not make her any less human.
translation.zh: ‎也不意味着她就不算是人了

translation.en: As far as we know, it's not contagious.
translation.zh: ‎而且至少据我们所知 她的病不传染

translation.en: [McEnroe] But she wouldn't have to go through it alone.
translation.zh: ‎但她不用一个人经历这一切

translation.en: Her two best friends took the situation in stride.
translation.zh: ‎她的两个闺蜜很快接受了现实

translation.en: Well, maybe not in stride, but definitely in character.
translation.zh: ‎也许不是很快 但绝对是很有个性

translation.en: One day, you will walk again.
translation.zh: ‎总有一天 你会重新站起来的

translation.en: If not, I will build you legs.
translation.zh: ‎如果不行 我会给你造一双腿的

translation.en: This is Fabiola Torres, captain of the high school robotics team.
translation.zh:
‎这位是法比奥拉托雷斯
‎高中机器人队的队长

translation.en: And this is Eleanor Wong, president of the drama club.
translation.zh: ‎这位是埃莉诺王 戏剧社的社长

translation.en: This is worse than if it were happening to me.
translation.zh: ‎真是比发生在自己身上还让我难受

translation.en: In protest, I shan't use my legs either.
translation.zh: ‎为了抗议 我也不用腿了

translation.en: -[thuds to floor] -Aside from her friends,
there was only one other person who could raise her spirits...
translation.zh: ‎还有一个人可以让她提起精神

translation.en: and also her heart rate.
Paxton Hall-Yoshida, the hottest guy at Sherman Oaks High.
translation.zh:
‎帕克斯顿霍尔吉田
‎谢尔曼奧克斯高中最帅的男生

translation.en: I know it's a little weird for me to be saying that,
but come on, look at this kid's jawline.
translation.zh: ‎但说真的 看看这孩子下颌的轮廓

translation.en: And as it turned out,
three months after Devi's paralysis set in,
Paxton's chiseled face actually worked a miracle.
translation.zh: ‎帕克斯顿雕塑般的面庞让奇迹出现了

translation.en: [male voice] Come on, dude. Give me a turn.
Just like that, she could walk again.
translation.zh: ‎就这样 她又可以走路了

translation.en: So today, Devi returns to high school.
translation.zh: ‎所以今天 德维要回高中了

translation.en: Can she shed her old identity
translation.zh: ‎她能否把自己在学校活动上

translation.en: as the paralyzed Indian girl,
whose dad dropped dead at a school function?
It's not likely.
Those things are pretty unforgettable,
but with working legs comes a whole host of new possibilities.
translation.zh: ‎但是有了好用的腿就有了新的可能性

translation.en: So go get 'em, Devi!
[Nalini] Devi, are you still praying? Our gods have other stuff to do, you know?
translation.zh:
‎德维 你还在祈祷吗？
‎神明们还有其他事情要忙呢

translation.en: I was about to ask for good grades.
Now, grab your textbooks. We need to go.
translation.zh: ‎带上你的课本 我们得走了

translation.en: [Nalini gasps] Devi,
translation.zh: ‎德维 那本课本是被开过光的

translation.en: that textbook has been blessed. If it touches the ground,
translation.zh: ‎德维 那本课本是被开过光的 ‎要是掉地上了 就又得拿去找牧师了

translation.en: I have to take it back to the priest.
translation.zh: ‎要是掉地上了 就又得拿去找牧师了

translation.en: I don't have the time to go to Rancho Cucamonga today.
translation.zh: ‎我今天可没时间去库卡蒙格牧场

translation.en: It's fine. I caught it.
Oh, Devi! I made you a lunch.
[McEnroe] That's Devi's cousin, Kamala.
She moved in after Mohan's passing to complete her PhD at CalTech.
translation.zh:
‎她在莫汉去世之后搬了进来
‎攻读加州理工学院的博士学位

translation.en: Devi is not a fan.
I don't bring lunch on Tuesdays. It's square pizza day.
translation.zh: ‎我周二不带午饭 今天吃方形披萨

translation.en: Devi, don't be rude to your beautiful cousin.
translation.zh: ‎德维 别对你美丽的堂姐不礼貌

translation.en: I'm not that beautiful.
Sorry. Are you a model?
Oh, thank you so much.
No. I'm a biologist.
I could never be a model. I'm too curvaceous.
translation.zh: ‎我可当不了模特 我太有曲线了

translation.en: I know this sounds crazy, but would you want to get dinner?
translation.zh:
‎我知道有点冒昧
‎但是你愿意一起吃晚饭吗？

translation.en: Hey, buddy, keep it moving.
Take your broke-ass bike and get out of here.
translation.zh: ‎骑上你的破车离这儿远一点

translation.en: [Nalini] This can't keep happening.
Our recycling bins can't take much more of this.
translation.zh: ‎我们的垃圾桶都快要受不了了

translation.en: How long is Kamala gonna stay with us?
translation.zh: ‎卡玛拉还要和我们一起住多久？

translation.en: As long as it takes for her to finish her studies. Why?
She's just so... Indian.
Like, the other day,
translation.zh: ‎就像那天 她说她要把电视开了

translation.en: she said she was gonna open the TV instead of turn on the TV.
translation.zh: ‎就像那天 她说她要把电视开了 ‎而不是打开电视

translation.en: Devi, she's family. She's bettering her life.
translation.zh: ‎德维 她是家人 她在努力改善生活

translation.en: You could actually learn a bit from her.
I bet she doesn't let her textbooks fall on the floor.
translation.zh: ‎我猜她肯定不会让课本掉地上

translation.en: [Devi] Oh, my God. It never touched the ground!
translation.zh: ‎我的天啊 它根本就没掉到地上！

translation.en: [McEnroe] As Devi walked into school for the first time,
it was impossible not to notice everybody staring at her.
translation.zh: ‎很难不注意到大家都在盯着她看

translation.en: But it didn't matter, because she had her squad.
translation.zh: ‎但是没关系 她还有闺蜜们

translation.en: Have you seen the nurse's new haircut? I love it.
translation.zh: ‎你看见护士的新发型了吗？超好看

translation.en: [Eleanor] No, I have to check it out.
Guys, sophomore year is gonna be our year. I can feel it.
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的 高二将会是属于我们的一年
‎我能感觉得到

translation.en: Sophomore actually means "wise fool" in Greek,
translation.zh: ‎希腊语里高二的意思是“聪明的傻瓜”

translation.en: so it can really go either way.
Oh, my God. I just realized
that this is our last first day of sophomore year we'll ever have.
translation.zh: ‎这是我们最后一次高二开学第一天了

translation.en: -I'm gonna cry. -Right.
This reminds me of a problem I want to talk to you guys about.
translation.zh: ‎让我想起要跟你俩说的一件事

translation.en: We're not cool.
Uh, would a not cool person wear... one dangly earring?
translation.zh: ‎不酷的人会只戴一边耳坠吗？

translation.en: Was that a choice, or did you lose your earring on the bus?
translation.zh:
‎你是故意的
‎还是另一边耳坠掉公交车上了？

translation.en: I didn't ride the bus. I rollerbladed.
translation.zh: ‎我没坐公交 我是滑单排轮来的

translation.en: Who says we're not cool?
We're the only students who get to eat in the teachers' lounge.
translation.zh:
‎我们是唯一可以在教师休息室
‎吃饭的学生

translation.en: Yeah, we can't do that anymore.
We need to eat with kids our own age.
translation.zh: ‎我们得和同龄的孩子一起吃饭

translation.en: Guys, don't you want a better high-school experience?
translation.zh:
‎二位 你们不想要
‎更好的高中生活吗？

translation.en: I mean, last year was a freshmen shit-fest.
translation.zh: ‎去年的高一生活简直糟糕透顶

translation.en: Are you saying that 'cause of your mobility issue?
translation.zh: ‎你难道不是因为残疾了才这么说？

translation.en: What? No. Nobody even remembers that.
translation.zh: ‎什么？才没有 没人会记得的

translation.en: 'Sup, FDR? [laughs]
Well, nobody will remember that once we're cool.
translation.zh: ‎只要我们变酷了 就没人会记得了

translation.en: Which brings me to my plan.
This year, we're rebranding.
We are glamorous women of color, who deserve a sexy high school life.
translation.zh:
‎我们是有魅力的有色人种美女
‎高中生活应该有声有色

translation.en: Fabiola, you are naturally snatched,
translation.zh: ‎法比奥拉 你有天然的吸引力

translation.en: but you dress like a helpful Honda guy.
What are you talking about?
The janitor said I reminded him of his nephew.
translation.zh: ‎保洁大叔说我让他想起他侄子

translation.en: Favorite nephew.
Eleanor, could you chill out on your spontaneous show tune singing?
translation.zh:
‎埃莉诺 你能不能别再随时
‎来上一段即兴音乐剧了？

translation.en: ♪ Not likely ♪
Well, if you refuse to change your personalities,
translation.zh: ‎如果你们拒绝改变个性的话

translation.en: I guess we'll just move onto step two, and get boyfriends.
translation.zh:
‎那我们只能直接进行第二步了
‎交男朋友

translation.en: [both stammer] Boyfriends?
I have chosen attainable, yet status-enhancing people
translation.zh: ‎我已经给我们仨各自选好了单身的

translation.en: for each of us to date.
Fabiola, you get Alex Gomez.
translation.zh: ‎法比奥拉 你的是亚历克斯戈麦斯

translation.en: -Ugh! -[laughs] Suck it, Gomez.
I can't go out with Alex Gomez. He's like a foot shorter than me.
translation.zh:
‎我不能跟亚历克斯戈麦斯交往
‎他比我矮30厘米呢

translation.en: Yeah, but he has a hot face.
You'll be like Zayn and Gigi.
-Who are they? -Zayn and Gigi.
Are you out of your goddamn mind? Forget it.
Eleanor, you are gonna date Boris Kozlov.
translation.zh:
‎埃莉诺 你要约会的是
‎鲍里斯科兹洛夫

translation.en: The Russian exchange student?
He's eating an onion.
Yeah. He's international and sexy.
You could write a play about it.
Hmm, intriguing.
Who are you going for?
Jonah Sharpe.
Oh, my God, Tiffany. Where did you get that top? I'm gagged.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 蒂芙尼 ‎你这件上衣哪儿买的？我喜欢

translation.en: Uh... Jonah Sharpe is gay.
But technically, he's not out yet, and he's pretty popular,
translation.zh:
‎但理论上来讲 他还没出柜
‎而且他很受欢迎

translation.en: so I'll be his beard until I can springboard off of him
translation.zh: ‎所以在我可以换个直男男友之前

translation.en: to a straight boyfriend.
You know you sound like a sociopath, right?
Sociopaths get shit done, Fab.
Now, go sit next to your marks, and lock 'em down.
translation.zh:
‎现在去坐到你们的目标旁边
‎搞定他们

translation.en: [nervously] Hi.
[hesitantly] Hi.
Hey, Jonah. You smell great today.
Thank you. It's Forever by Mariah Carey.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 是玛丽亚凯莉的永恒香水

translation.en: [McEnroe] This disgusted reaction belongs to Ben Gross, Devi's nemesis.
translation.zh:
‎表示反胃的这位是本格罗斯
‎德维的宿敌

translation.en: Because Devi and her friends were an ethnically diverse group
translation.zh: ‎因为德维和她的朋友们是多种族的

translation.en: of academically-focused, um...
I can't think of a better word for "dorks."
translation.zh: ‎除了“书呆子”我想不出别的词了

translation.en: The rest of the school called them the gently racist nickname, the UN.
translation.zh:
‎学校里的其他人
‎委婉地戏称她们为UN

translation.en: It was widely known to have been created by Ben.
translation.zh: ‎大家都知道这名字是本取的

translation.en: Do you know when you can't use your legs for no medical reason,
translation.zh: ‎知道吗？腿失去行动力若非医学原因

translation.en: it's called psychosomatic?
Which, my dad says, means fake.
Ben Gross's father, Howard, whom he idolized,
translation.zh: ‎本格罗斯很崇拜他的父亲霍华德

translation.en: was a top entertainment attorney in Beverly Hills.
translation.zh: ‎他是比佛利山最棒的娱乐律师

translation.en: This allowed Ben Gross to dine out for years
translation.zh: ‎本格罗斯几年来一直在炫耀

translation.en: on the fact that Blake Griffin was at his Bar Mitzvah.
translation.zh: ‎布雷克格里芬来参加了他的成人礼

translation.en: And he and Devi had been vying for the number one spot in the class
translation.zh: ‎他和德维一直在竞争班里第一的位置

translation.en: every year since the first grade.
You might call them the John McEnroe and Jimmy Connors
translation.zh: ‎你可以说他们是谢尔曼奧克斯高中的

translation.en: of Sherman Oaks High School.
Not to make this about me.
Good morning, you young, brilliant minds.
translation.zh: ‎早上好 年轻又聪明的同学们

translation.en: Welcome to Facing History...
[smacks lips] and Ourselves.
This is not gonna be your typical history class.
We are going to be unpacking some very difficult subjects...
translation.zh: ‎我们将讨论一些非常严肃的话题…

translation.en: like, uh... slavery,
and the Holocaust.
Think of this as a ride on a tour bus
translation.zh: ‎把这门课想象成乘坐穿越历史上

translation.en: through some of the darkest moments of our history.
[McEnroe] Just then, the high school gods chose to smile down on Devi.
translation.zh: ‎就在这时 高中之神选择向德维微笑

translation.en: Thanks to Paxton's extreme apathy toward school,
translation.zh: ‎幸亏派克斯顿非常厌恶上学

translation.en: he was forced to retake this class, which he failed as a sophomore.
translation.zh: ‎他被迫重修了高二时没及格的这门课

translation.en: Maybe this year was looking up after all.
Damn.
"Damn" is right, Devi. This is some really heavy stuff.
translation.zh: ‎说得对 德维 这是些非常严肃的话题

translation.en: Genocide is not 100.
translation.zh: ‎大屠杀可不是表情包里的小笑脸

translation.en: And systemic racism is not litty.
translation.zh: ‎系统性种族歧视也不会超赞

translation.en: As we travel through all of humanity's most horrific atrocities,
translation.zh: ‎随着我们回顾人类最恐怖的暴行

translation.en: I want you to feel shooketh.
[teacher] Thank you.
Trust.
But even though she told her friends that Jonah was the one she was after,
translation.zh: ‎但虽然她跟朋友们说她要追乔纳

translation.en: Paxton Hall-Yoshida just seemed so much more,
I don't know... hot?
[teacher] Devi, Ben. Can you come back in here, please?
translation.zh: ‎德维 本  你们能回来一下吗？

translation.en: I am honored to have powerful voices in my class,
translation.zh: ‎我很荣幸班上有这么聪明的学生

translation.en: but in the past, the competition between the two of you
has not been... useful to the learning environment of others.
translation.zh: ‎一直…有助其他同学的学习氛围

translation.en: [McEnroe] Devi has, what you might consider, a short fuse,
and sometimes, she's a straight up psycho,
which I find pretty admirable.
So do you think you can set aside your rivalry
translation.zh: ‎所以你们能不能为了班集体

translation.en: for the good of the class?
Well, of course, Mister Shapiro.
A great idea, as always.
I agree. In fact, I liked your idea even more than he did. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎我同意 实际上
‎我比他更喜欢你的想法

translation.en: Okay.
Man, David, watching you flirt with Jonah
translation.zh: ‎天啊 大卫 看你跟乔纳调情

translation.en: was just about the saddest thing I've ever seen,
translation.zh: ‎简直是我见过最让人难过的事了

translation.en: and I saw my dad run over our cat.
translation.zh: ‎比我家的猫被我爸撞死还惨

translation.en: You know he's gay, right?
Your cat? No, I didn't.
[sarcastically] That's so cool.
Word of advice: just give up.
Plenty of amazing people have died as virgins.
translation.zh: ‎有很多很好的人一辈子没做过爱

translation.en: You and the rest of the UN are in good company.
You know? You shouldn't call us the UN.
-It's racist, and offensive, and-- -What?
translation.zh:
‎-这是种族歧视 很无礼 很…
‎-什么？

translation.en: Oh, like the United Nations?
No. We call you the UN, because you are unfuckable nerds.
translation.zh:
‎不 这样叫是因为你们是
‎找不到人做爱的书呆子

translation.en: Can you believe he said that?
What do you think, Doctor Ryan? Do you agree with him?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得呢 瑞安医生？
‎你同意他说的话吗？

translation.en: [McEnroe] This is Doctor Jamie Ryan, a child psychologist
translation.zh: ‎这位是加利福尼亚州托卢卡湖的

translation.en: from Toluca Lake, California.
translation.zh: ‎少儿心理学家杰米瑞安医生

translation.en: She's Devi's therapist,
and this morning, the woman Devi is shouting at.
translation.zh: ‎今天早晨 她是德维咆哮的对象

translation.en: Wait, you're asking me to tell you if I think you're bangable?
translation.zh: ‎你是想让我说 我觉得你有魅力吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Devi, I can't do that.
translation.zh:
‎-是的
‎-德维 我不能那么做

translation.en: Ethically, legally, and most importantly, it's creepy.
translation.zh:
‎从道德上、法律上都不行
‎更重要的是这太诡异了

translation.en: So you agree with Ben Gross and the whole school
translation.zh:
‎所以你同意本格罗斯
‎和其他同学的说法

translation.en: and think I'm a disgusting troll?
translation.zh: ‎你也觉得我是个恶心的丑八怪？

translation.en: Hey, I am not going to tell you I think you're sexy.
translation.zh: ‎喂 我不会跟你说我觉得你很性感

translation.en: I will tell you that kid sucks, and you should ignore him.
translation.zh:
‎我要告诉你那孩子很讨厌
‎你不应该搭理他

translation.en: Doctor Ryan, you know how much trouble I have taking the high road.
translation.zh:
‎瑞安医生 你知道要成熟地处理事情
‎对我来说有多难

translation.en: I do. Why don't you sit down?
So, you're back up on your feet.
That's gotta feel good.
Yeah. That part was good.
It was so nice not to be in a wheelchair,
but people were still staring at me.
They all think I was faking being paralyzed.
Why would I fake that?
Because it's such a cool look
to have your cousin help you onto the toilet?
Listen, I think I've got something that could really help you.
translation.zh: ‎听着 有样东西我觉得可以帮到你

translation.en: Paxil, Lexapro, Xanax, Zoloft? I'll try anything.
translation.zh:
‎帕罗西汀、依地普仑、阿普措仑
‎左洛复？我什么都愿意尝试

translation.en: Whoa! Knock it off, wannabe pill popper.
translation.zh: ‎哦！你算了吧 想当瘾君子吗

translation.en: It's a grief journal.
Sometimes, the pain we feel is too hard to say out loud.
translation.zh: ‎有时我们的痛苦很难说出口

translation.en: This way, you don't actually have to say it.
translation.zh: ‎用这种方式 你不用真的说出口

translation.en: And if this doesn't work, you can always prescribe me some Klonopin.
translation.zh:
‎如果这个不管用
‎你可以给我开点科诺品

translation.en: Girl, bye.
Devi, how was your first day at school?
translation.zh: ‎德维 开学第一天怎么样？

translation.en: I'll be honest. It was mixed.
I got all the classes I wanted.
Prime locker location. Ben Gross is still a dick.
translation.zh:
‎更衣柜位置不错
‎本格罗斯还是个混蛋

translation.en: Are we allowed to say "dick" now?
No one can say "dick" in this house.
translation.zh: ‎不 在这个家里谁也不许说“混蛋”

translation.en: Why do let that Ben Gross rile you up so much? He's like 5'2".
translation.zh:
‎你为什么总让本格罗斯欺负你？
‎他也就一米五八高

translation.en: Damn, Mom! That was savage. Up top.
translation.zh: ‎该死 妈妈 说得好 击掌

translation.en: Ah, okay. I do not like high-fiving. It's violent.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我不喜欢击掌 太暴力了

translation.en: Can we please not do that again?
On a more civilized note,
I received some very exciting information today.
translation.zh: ‎我今天接到了非常让人激动的消息

translation.en: Kamala, your parents have found you a match...
translation.zh: ‎卡玛拉 你父母给你找了个…

translation.en: for marriage.
They did?
Yes! His name is Prashant. He's an engineer.
translation.zh: ‎是的 他叫普拉桑特 是名工程师

translation.en: Isn't that fantastic?
[McEnroe] Kamala was expected to have an arranged marriage
translation.zh: ‎卡玛拉知道等海外的学业一结束

translation.en: after she finished her studies abroad,
translation.zh: ‎等待自己的肯定是包办婚姻

translation.en: but she felt less than enthusiastic about this idea.
translation.zh: ‎但她对这件事可不那么热情

translation.en: Oh, that's so wonderful.
A husband from India? Someone I've never met before.
translation.zh:
‎一位来自印度的老公？
‎我从来没见过的人

translation.en: [sarcastically] Perfect stranger. How exciting.
I know!
Finally, some good news for this family.
Yeah. That's frigging great.
Kamala does nothing and gets a full husband in the mail.
translation.zh:
‎卡玛拉什么都不用做
‎从邮件里就来了个老公

translation.en: Meanwhile, I'm trying to trick a gay guy into going to Johnny Rockets with me.
translation.zh:
‎而我还在想办法骗一个同志男
‎一起去约翰火箭餐厅

translation.en: You know what? I'm just too jealous to eat with you right now.
translation.zh:
‎你知道吗？我现在太嫉妒你了
‎不想和你一起吃饭

translation.en: Devi...
[male voice] Devi.
-[male voice] Devi, come here. -[clapping in background]
-Dad? -Come, come. Sit down.
I want to show you something.
This is John McEnroe.
He is my favorite player of all time.
translation.zh: ‎他是有史以来我最喜欢的球员

translation.en: [McEnroe] Hey, look at that! It's me.
I told you it would all make sense.
He doesn't let anyone push him around.
translation.zh: ‎他从不让别人告诉他该怎么做

translation.en: Look at him, giving it back to that umpire.
He's a firecracker... just like you.
Kanna, what is it?
Dad, am I ugly?
What nonsense. I'm looking at you right now.
translation.zh: ‎胡说什么 我正看着你呢

translation.en: You're the most beautiful girl in the world.
translation.zh: ‎你是世界上最漂亮的女孩儿

translation.en: No. Kamala is beautiful,
and a boy at school said that I was an un--
He said something mean to me.
This boy is clearly an idiot, like this umpire.
translation.zh:
‎那小子肯定是个笨蛋
‎就和这个裁判一样

translation.en: Do you think John McEnroe would let that umpire tell him
translation.zh: ‎你觉得约翰麦肯罗会放任他

translation.en: that he's not beautiful?
No. He would stand up for himself.
So I should beat up Ben Gross?
translation.zh: ‎所以我应该揍本格罗斯一顿？

translation.en: What? No, no, no.
You fight back with your spirit, little one.
translation.zh: ‎你应该用你的精神来反击 小家伙

translation.en: You stand up for yourself, just like him.
translation.zh: ‎捍卫你自己 就像他一样

translation.en: [over TV] Answer my question! The question, jerk!
translation.zh: ‎回答我的问题！问题 混蛋！

translation.en: Thanks, Dad. I'll try.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 老爸 我会试试看的

translation.en: Wait. What are you doing here?
This is my living room.
[stammers] No, I mean, you died.
translation.zh: ‎不 我的意思是 你死了

translation.en: Oh, that? I'm better now.
[McEnroe] So the next morning, Devi took her dad's advice
translation.zh:
‎所以第二天早晨
‎德维听从了爸爸的意见

translation.en: and decided to fight back with her spirit, AKA she would be serving a damn lewk.
translation.zh:
‎决定用精神来反击
‎换句话说 她要穿得很靓

translation.en: Ben Gross better get ready to eat his words.
Woah, Devi, you look like an Indian Kardashian.
translation.zh: ‎德维 你看着就像印度版的卡戴珊

translation.en: Thanks, Fab, but I thought we were dressing hot today.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢你 法布
‎不是说好今天要穿漂亮点嘛

translation.en: This is my boys' medium polo instead of my usual large.
translation.zh:
‎我穿的这是男童中码马球衫
‎平时我都穿大码的

translation.en: -The janitor said-- -No. Just, no.
translation.zh:
‎-清洁工说…
‎-不 请 别说了

translation.en: -Stop. -[Eleanor] Well, I know I did a good job.
Get a load of sexy flapper girl.
[dramatically] My grandmother died in this dress.
translation.zh: ‎我奶奶去世时穿的就是这条裙子

translation.en: Okay. Let's just stick to the plan.
What's our goal for today?
-[both] To make conversation. -Right.
We're talking to the boys.
I'm gonna ask Jonah to come over and watch unreleased Ariana Grande footage.
translation.zh:
‎我要请乔纳来我家看
‎爱莉安娜格兰德被减掉的镜头

translation.en: Before you know it, we'll all be boinking at prom. Okay.
translation.zh:
‎很快我们就要和他们在晚会上
‎为爱鼓掌了 好

translation.en: Boyfriend, here I co--
[nervously] Hey, Jonah.
Ew, you're bleeding.
You're getting knee blood on the chair. It's unsanitary.
translation.zh: ‎你膝盖上的血都蹭椅子上了 ‎太不卫生了 你会得艾滋病的

translation.en: You could have AIDS.
translation.zh: ‎太不卫生了 你会得艾滋病的

translation.en: I thought no one would bang me. How could I have AIDS?
translation.zh:
‎我还以为没人会和我上床
‎我怎么得艾滋啊？

translation.en: Easy. Blood transfusion.
Or sharing needles.
[scoffs] You wish you were cool enough for intravenous drugs.
Oh. Drugs are, like, cool now? I didn't realize
translation.zh: ‎吸毒现在是很酷的事了？ ‎我怎么不知道你是土包子瘾君子

translation.en: you were a hillbilly tweaker. I guess you're skinny enough.
translation.zh: ‎我怎么不知道你是土包子瘾君子 ‎你倒是够瘦弱

translation.en: Uh, I'm not skinny. I'm jacked.
translation.zh: ‎我不是瘦弱 我这叫精壮

translation.en: Hmph, for now, until you morph into your big fat dad.
translation.zh:
‎也就这几年 你会慢慢长成
‎你老爸那么胖的

translation.en: Shut up. My dad's hot.
You've no idea what he's been through. He has thyroid issues.
translation.zh: ‎你不知道他的经历 他甲状腺有问题

translation.en: Enough! We talked about this yesterday.
How can we mend the conflict of our past when the conflict of our present rages on?
translation.zh:
‎如果我们当下的冲突持续爆发
‎又如何弥合过去的裂痕？

translation.en: -Boo. -That doesn't mean anything.
Those responses were very hurtful.
Go to the principal's office.
[principal] Look who it is. Tweedle Dumb and Tweedle Idiot.
translation.zh: ‎（格拉布校长） ‎看看这是谁来了 傻兄笨弟

translation.en: You will both report here after school to do some unpaid labor in the office.
translation.zh:
‎你们俩放学都给我来这里报道
‎做点义务劳动

translation.en: [both] Like an internship?
No. Like a punishment.
You're in trouble!
I can't.
I'm supposed to go cheer on my girlfriend's field hockey practice.
translation.zh: ‎我得去给我女朋友的曲棍球训练加油

translation.en: You know, I support women.
Is that why, Mister Feminist?
translation.zh: ‎是这个原因吗 女权主义先生？

translation.en: Or is it to watch a bunch of teenage boobs bounce around?
translation.zh: ‎还是你想看女孩们的胸部晃来晃去？

translation.en: Field hockey is a beautiful sport.
Busted. You're a perv.
translation.zh: ‎被戳穿了吧 你这个色狼

translation.en: And what are you laughing at, Erin Brockovich?
translation.zh: ‎笑什么笑 埃琳布罗克维奇

translation.en: Is that a skirt or a headband?
You know, get your acts together,
or I will personally call all the Ivys and tell them not to admit you.
translation.zh:
‎不然我就打电话给常春藤大学
‎让他们都别录取你们

translation.en: Get ready to get your online degree at StDoofusUniversity.com.
translation.zh: ‎准备好拿家里蹲大学的函授文凭吧

translation.en: You're dismissed.
Your stupid heels are slowing us down. Take them off.
translation.zh: ‎你的高跟鞋拖我们后腿了 赶紧脱了

translation.en: Yeah, I'm sure you'd like to see my bare feet, sicko.
translation.zh: ‎是 我想你肯定是想看我光脚 变态

translation.en: Foot fetish much?
Oh, my God! Oliver Martinez?
Stop molesting my friend!
He's not molesting me. He's caressing me.
translation.zh: ‎他不是对我动手动脚 他在抚摸我

translation.en: He's my boyfriend.
Wait. You have a boyfriend?
We had to keep it a secret.
I mean, can you imagine the shock waves it would send through drama club?
translation.zh:
‎你能想象这会给戏剧社带来
‎多大冲击吗？

translation.en: An actress dating tech crew?
I just... I didn't want to upstage you
while you were trying to get a boyfriend of your own.
translation.zh: ‎找男朋友的过程中让你难堪

translation.en: I can't believe you didn't tell me and Fabiola.
translation.zh:
‎我不敢相信
‎你居然没告诉我和法比奥拉

translation.en: [nervously] Fabiola knows.
I guess I was wrong when I said no one would date anyone in the UN.
translation.zh:
‎我说没人会
‎和书呆子小团体的人交往 我错了

translation.en: They just won't date you.
-Shut up, Ben! -Ow.
I'm sorry. I just didn't know how you would react with your legs and everything.
translation.zh:
‎对不起 一想到你的腿
‎和你的遭遇 我怕你会受打击

translation.en: I didn't want to upset you.
Me? Upset?
No. You should be upset for your weird taste in men.
translation.zh:
‎不 你应该为自己
‎对男人奇怪的品味而不高兴

translation.en: [sarcastically] Me? I'm cool. Cool as ice.
Peace.
You guys saw her hit me, right? You know, my dad's a lawyer.
translation.zh:
‎你们都看见她打我了吧？
‎我爸爸可是律师

translation.en: [McEnroe] When you're a normal person
with genuinely balanced reactions to things,
it may be hard to understand why we hotheads fly off the handle.
translation.zh:
‎可能无法理解我们暴脾气
‎为什么会失控爆发

translation.en: For me, it's a reasonable reaction
translation.zh: ‎对我来说 那是对大多数

translation.en: to the general blindness of most tennis umpires.
translation.zh: ‎瞎眼的网球裁判的合理反应

translation.en: For Devi, it's a logical response
translation.zh: ‎对德维来说 那是对她闺蜜

translation.en: to being betrayed by her supposed best friends.
How could Eleanor have a boyfriend and not tell her about it?
translation.zh: ‎埃莉诺怎么能有男朋友却不告诉她？

translation.en: And why would she tell Fabiola?
translation.zh: ‎她又为什么要告诉法比奥拉？

translation.en: Does she think Devi's too unhinged to handle it?
translation.zh: ‎她是不是觉得德维太冲动接受不了？

translation.en: Or that Devi would be jealous of her?
Do both of her friends think
she's just a pitiful, lonely, wheelchair girl without a freaking dad?
translation.zh:
‎她只是个可怜又孤零零
‎坐轮椅还没了爹的女孩？

translation.en: -What the hell? -[Devi screams]
And that's how it happens, folks.
That's how we hotheads boil over.
translation.zh: ‎这就是我们这些暴脾气是如何爆发的

translation.en: What was that? What happened to the window?
[stammers] A bird hit it.
Bird?
This is my fault for keeping the windows so clean.
translation.zh: ‎是我的错 我把玻璃擦得太干净了

translation.en: Where is the poor bird?
It flew away.
[Nalini] It flew away?
After breaking the window with its body?
translation.zh: ‎用身体撞碎玻璃 然后还能飞走？

translation.en: Devi, that book was blessed by God!
translation.zh: ‎德维 那本书是开过光的！

translation.en: The bird must have done it.
[angrily] Devi, you are lying to your mother,
translation.zh: ‎德维 你一边对妈妈说谎

translation.en: and then bringing shame on an innocent bird?
Just leave me alone!
Doctor Ryan?
Devi, we don't have an appointment.
I know, but I need your help.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 但我需要你的帮助

translation.en: Wait. Why do you look hot?
translation.zh: ‎等等 你怎么穿那么漂亮？

translation.en: Do you have a date?
Uh... yes, I do. And don't look so shocked.
translation.zh: ‎是的 别一副震惊的样子

translation.en: I do have a life outside of being your therapist.
translation.zh:
‎除了做你的心理医生
‎我也是有个人生活的

translation.en: Not right now, you don't. I need your help.
translation.zh: ‎你现在没有 我需要你的帮助

translation.en: Okay.
What's going on?
Eleanor has a secret boyfriend
that her and Fabiola have been keeping from me,
because they thought I was unhinged and would have a nervous breakdown.
translation.zh:
‎因为她们觉得我脾气暴躁
‎可能会心理崩溃

translation.en: Which, it seems like you are.
Yeah, I'm losing it, Doc.
translation.zh: ‎是 我撑不住了 医生

translation.en: Okay. All right.
Talk to me. How does their lie make you feel?
translation.zh:
‎跟我说说 知道她们说谎
‎你是什么感觉？

translation.en: It doesn't matter how it makes me feel.
It matters how it makes me look.
Well, all right. How do you want to look?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 那你希望是什么形象？

translation.en: Normal. I just want to be a normal girl, who isn't called mean names,
translation.zh:
‎正常人的形象 我只想做个
‎正常的女孩 没人给我起外号

translation.en: and could actually have a boyfriend.
I don't even care who he is, as long as he wanted to be with me.
translation.zh:
‎我都不在乎他是谁
‎只要愿意和我在一起就行

translation.en: Devi, look, can I be honest with you?
translation.zh: ‎德维 我得跟你说句实话

translation.en: Having just any boyfriend, no matter who he is,
translation.zh: ‎找个男朋友 不管他是谁

translation.en: is not gonna make you happier or change who you are.
translation.zh:
‎都不会让你更幸福
‎也不会改变你这个人

translation.en: Trust me, but after all you've been through,
translation.zh: ‎相信我 你经历了那么多

translation.en: maybe you shouldn't be so focused on having a boyfriend.
translation.zh: ‎也许你不该纠结于找男朋友

translation.en: I mean, do you really think you'd make a good girlfriend right now?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得现在的你会是个好女友吗？

translation.en: Probably not.
Okay.
So what is it you can do this year to succeed at something
that would actually make you happy...
and make you feel good about yourself?
translation.zh: ‎又能让你对自己更有信心呢？

translation.en: I think I know what I need to do.
All right. My girl.
Now get to gettin'. I got a hot date.
translation.zh: ‎去做吧 我还得去约会呢

translation.en: Good luck on your date.
Later, man.
Hi, Paxton.
You don't know me, but my name is Devi Vishwakumar.
translation.zh: ‎你不认识我 我叫德维维什瓦库马尔

translation.en: I'm a sophomore.
I sit behind you in history class.
I was also paralyzed last year?
Oh, okay, great. You are familiar with that.
So here's the thing.
I'm into you.
Like, I could name every class you've had for the last two years.
translation.zh:
‎我能说出过去两年里
‎你上过的所有的课

translation.en: But I won't do that.
And I know you'd never be my boyfriend,
because you're you, and I'm me,
translation.zh: ‎因为你是你 而我只是我

translation.en: but I was wondering if you would ever consider...
[stammers] h--having sex with me?
Oh, my God. I'm such an idiot. I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: ‎我的天啊 我真是个傻瓜 对不起

translation.en: -I can't believe I just did that. -Yeah.
Okay.
What?
[McEnroe] What? That actually worked?
[Paxton] Just sex, right?
[Devi] Just sex.
I'm down, but I can't tonight.
Wow, okay!
Twist. This is surprising.
Looking forward to it.
Will circle back about it.
Okay!
[McEnroe] Devi couldn't believe it.
For the first time, she had something she wanted to write in her grief journal.
translation.zh:
‎她第一次有了想要
‎写进疗伤日记的东西

translation.en: ♪ Left you thinking in the dark ♪
♪ Oh, my God ♪
